name: Seattle Sports Neoprene 225g Bear Spray Holster
description: Keep your bear spray within reach. You may never need it, but if you do, chances are you'll need it in a hurry. This neoprene holster allows you to carry your bear spray on a belt or pack strap.Grippy neoprene stretches to hold canisters securely.Fits most 225g bear spray canisters (canister not included).Red fabric with a high-vis orange tab is easily to find in your bag or in the dark.2 belt loops of varying width let you attach it to various sized straps.Velcro® closure secures the canister, but is easy to undo.Fits 225g canisters.
